resources:
Adaptive Focus Zone
This service locks selected applications to prevent their usage.
When you grant the \"Draw Over Other Apps\" permission to an app, it will be able to :\n \nInteract with other apps, such as stopping other apps.
The \"Notification \" permission allows our app to notify the user\'s device.
The \"Usage Access\" permission allows an app to access data about how other apps are being used.
Take a break from your phone \nand focus on things that really matter.
Normal mode will allow you to make changes and white list apps/websites at any time.
Prevents you from changing settings and uninstalling the app.
Select the applications you want to access when \'Take a Break\' is blocking you
e.g. 30 minutes per day
e.g. 20 launches per day
e.g. block access entirely
View your screen time, launch count & more
1. You won\'t be able to use your phone while the break is enabled. \n 2. Also, you won\'t be able to receive any calls while the break is underway. \n 3. Enable stop button to be able to stop the break. \n 4. Enable call button to be able to make calls. \n 5. Block notifications to prevent further distractions. \n
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
Note: Schedule - Usage Limit & Number of Launches won\'t work for websites and keywords.
Settings
First Fragment Second Fragment Next Previous
